SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.deck

Class RevisionAddCardFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.deck.RevisionAddCardFXMLController
@Component public class RevisionAddCardFXMLController extends FXMLController
A controller class for managing the addition of new cards to a deck, either manually or by importing from a file.

This class provides a user interface with text fields to manually add a card's front and back text. Additionally, it allows users to import multiple cards from a file. The class also manages dynamic translations and layout scaling based on the current stage properties.
